<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://schemas.ericsson.com/ma/EIR/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://schemas.ericsson.com/ma/EIR/" con:config.script: def props = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName( "Properties" ) startimei = props.getPropertyValue("startimei").toLong() threadvol = props.getPropertyValue("threadvol").toInteger() threadidx = context.ThreadIndex.toInteger() props.setPropertyValue("imeifrom"+context.ThreadIndex,(startimei+threadvol*threadidx).toString()) props.setPropertyValue("imeito"+context.ThreadIndex,(startimei+threadvol*threadidx+9).toString())
